articles.title: Nikki Glaser takes swings at CBS and Leonardo DiCaprio in Golden Globes monologue
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Nikki Glaser went hard then eased up in her monologue to open Sunday’s Golden Globes. articles.title: Trump’s motorcade in Florida rerouted due to ‘suspicious object’
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump’s motorcade took a different route than usual to the airport as he was departing Florida on Sunday due to a “suspicious object,” according to the White House.
